title: New: Giganta – Is Ma Beat
content: Athens-based producer Giganta will release her debut EP, Force, on Werk Discs/Ninja Tune on March 17th. ‘Is Ma Beat’ is the first tune from the aforementioned release is a track that builds on Giganta‘s dancehall philosophy with a frenzied beat and robotic vocal samples, ending up a mind-blowing, twisted R&B hybrid that will appeal to all the dancefloor lovers out there. The song weaves a pixelated magic spell and I feel privileged to groove under its influence! You can pick up Force on 12” or good old-fashioned download soon.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d44
